original: Buren, Carl Olof Bror, ingenjör, Grytgöl, f. 28/7/11 i Sthlm av disp. Carl Daniel B. o. Maria Munck af Fulkila. — Bergssk. i Filipstad 33, spec:-stud. v. KTH 37-39. Ing. v. Finspongs Metallv. A-B 35-37, Sv. Aeroplan A-B 40-41, Statens Ind :komm. 41-43, Ma-rinförvaltn. 43-46, driftsing. v. Grytgöls Bruks A-B sed. 46. Led. av styr. f. Grytgöls skyttegille sed. 47. Hobby: ridsport.
translated: Buren, Carl Olof Bror, engineer, Grytgöl, b. 28/7/11 in Stockholm, son of Carl Daniel B., a merchant, and Maria Munck af Fulkila. He attended the Bergsskolan in Filipstad from 1933 and studied engineering at KTH (Royal Institute of Technology) from 1937 to 1939. He worked as an engineer at Finspongs Metallvärk AB from 1935 to 1937, at Svenska Aeroplan AB from 1940 to 1941, at Statens Industrikommission from 1941 to 1943, and at Marinförvaltningen from 1943 to 1946. Since 1946, he has been a chief engineer at Grytgöl's Bruks AB. He has been a member of the board of Grytgöl's shooting guild since 1947. His hobby is horseback riding. Note that "married in the year 19xx to partner's name."
